ConditionalTunnel Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Tunnel. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Linked Input TunnelReturns a reference to the input tunnel linked to this tunnel. Details
Use Default if UnwiredGets or sets whether the tunnel uses default data if the left side of the tunnel is unwired. If this property is set to write and you specify FALSE, you must wire an input to the tunnel. Details
